Articles.Content: This huge fuel depot is currently in a LKO around Kerbin. The space station is comprised of 3 different modules, the habitation module which can house 8 Kerbals, the fuel module which can hold about 2000 Monopropellent and 10000 units of fuel, and the command module that has 4 solar arrays to power the station. It took 3 launches to make the station. Each launch a day after another. Picture: http://<a href="http://imgur.com/8aFRslc"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/8aFRslc.png" title="Hosted by imgur.com" /></a>
